facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only

policies.content: Note that if canceled, modified, or in case of no-show, the total price of the reservation will be charged.
You'll be charged a prepayment of 50% of the total price after reservation.

block_text.room_desc: This spacious, four-bedroom villa features a balcony and terrace offering views of the sea and golf course. Living and dining areas and a kitchen with stove, microwave and refrigerator are included. Villa also comes with a washing machine, barbecue facilities and spa tub.

block.mealplan: There is no meal option with this room.
block.name: Villa with Sea View

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information:
Please note that use the outdoor pool, fitness center, sauna room, tennis court and spa are subjected to additional charges upon request. Guests can use the Special Requests box available. For more information, please contact the property directly using details from the Booking Confirmation.

Payment before arrival by bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions. A damage deposit of USD 100 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 14 days before arrival. You'll be charged 50% of the total price if you cancel in the 14 days before arrival and the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 7 days before arrival.

All children are welcome. 4 children under 12 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
There is no capacity for extra beds in the room.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 12.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Free private parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
Pets are allowed on request. No extra charges.
You'll be charged a prepayment of 50% of the total price after reservation.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
